title: How to Become Amazing Gladiatus

steps.headline: Understand that the point of the Gladiatus is to become champion of the Arena, so it would seem logical to fight in the arena.
steps.description: Wrong. First, go to the tavern and get a quest. It is recommended to begin with "easy".

steps.headline: Be ready for the Publican at the tavern.
steps.description: He will probably give you a quest to kill something on an expedition somewhere. Go on the expedition. It will give you xp, you will gain money from the Publican, and also the creature you killed will give you stuff

steps.headline: Do not feel bad if you don't kill anything on your first few expeditions.
steps.description: That is normal. It will get your xp up and the chances of winning become greater.

steps.headline: Move ahead.
steps.description: After a few expeditions you will probably be getting bored. Go to the training in the city and get a few of your levels up.

steps.headline: Buy armour.
steps.description: Make sure you buy armor equal or less than your level. Don't waste your money.
